text:
Hi guys,

I just tried the latest nightly build of ant 1.5 because
I needed some of the nice new features. However, I had to
switch back to 1.4.1 because I was unable to use jikes 
with the nightly build.
The problem manifests as CreateProcess error. I verified
that this doesn't happen with 1.4.1. 

If you need more information, just add a notice to the
report. I may then attach the actual call and a log of
the exception.
creator: make@gmx.li
steve_l@iseran.com
text:
We all use jikes, so it is not a fundamental flaw in the version; it must be 
your configuration.

What is the Error #?  2? If that is the case then it is file not found on the 
path. Maybe jikes.exe was in the bin dir of your ant1.3 install

So
-where is your jikes.exe
-modify your build file to get the env variables <property environment="env"/>
-then echo out the value of path
-then verify that jikes.exe is in one of those directories

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: let's assume, jikes has not been in the PATH.
